agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Corrections TIME & DATE: upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, April 29, 2019 PLACE: 3W.15 CHAIR: Rep.
